glsa.title: Eggdrop: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A remote stack-based buffer overflow has been discovered in Eggdrop.

background.p: Eggdrop is an IRC bot extensible with C or Tcl.

description.p: Bow Sineath discovered a boundary error in the file mod/server.mod/servrmsg.c when processing overly long private messages sent by an IRC server.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice an Eggdrop user to connect the bot to a malicious server, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code on the host running Eggdrop.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Eggdrop users should upgrade to the latest version:
